claim: The Vietnam War altered the socio-economic and political divide between the North and the South.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The North -- South divide is broadly considered a socio-economic and political divide .

claim: The Vietnam War altered the socio-economic and political divide between the North and the South.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The resultant division of labor across continents closely follows the North -- South socio-economic and political divide , wherein the North -- with one quarter of the world population -- controls four fifths of the world income , while the South -- with three quarters of the world population -- has access to one fifth of the world income .
